info.title: Participant API
info.description: Endpoints for participant authentication, user management, and study interactions.

post.summary: Login using a temporary token (optionally with password or access token)
Get info for a temporary token
Get info for a password reset token

get.summary: Check if a code exists in a code list
List studies the user participates in

post.summary: Merge temporary participant into user profile
Merge a virtual participant into user profile by linking code

get.summary: Get a specific survey with context
Get a linking code by key
Get survey responses for a profile
Assigned surveys for a temporary participant
Get a survey with context for a temporary participant

post.summary: Submit a survey response for a temporary participant

get.summary: Get virtual participants by linking code
Request phone number verification code via SMS

post.summary: Create or update a user attribute

TokenAndUser.description: Access and refresh tokens with user

LoginWithTempTokenReq.description: Provide either accessToken or password along with tempToken.

User.description: Participant user object. Shape is extensive; represented as free-form for brevity.
